item.title: DIY banana face mask
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: In general I don’t do routine. My only routine is not having a routine. So as you may expect, I don’t really have a beauty or skincare regime: I wash my face in the shower ðŸ›€ and splash my face with soap ðŸ§¼ in the evenings sometimes if I feel like it. I don’t wear much makeup, especially not foundation but I am a terrible face toucher and skin picker.
